root.name: Wheel of Fortune
root.description: OverviewWheel of Fortune is an adaptation of Merv Griffin's word puzzle quiz show that allows for up to three human players with a pass-and-play system. Players take it in turn to spin the wheel and guess the Hangman-esque puzzles by revealing letters until the answer becomes clear.The game was released on both the Genesis and Super Nintendo, with almost zero difference between the two versions. It would be followed up (on the SNES only) with Wheel of Fortune: Deluxe Edition, which uses slightly updated graphics.
